elements.name: Verify product arrange in alphabetical order

steps.name: I am on home page
I click on the Computers top menu tab
I click on Desktop link in Computers top menu dropdown
I select "Name: Z to A" option from the Sort By dropdown
Products should be arranged in descending order by name

elements.name: Verify product added to shopping cart successfully

steps.name: I am on home page
I click on the Computers top menu tab
I click on Desktop link in Computers top menu dropdown
I select "Name: A to Z" option from the Sort By dropdown
I add 'Build Your Own Computer' in the cart
I verify the text "Build your own computer"
I select the "2.2 GHz Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2200" processor
I select "8GB [+$60.00]" of RAM
I click on desired  HDD
I click on desired  OS
I click on the software needed
I verify the price "$1,475.00" of Build Your Own Computer
I click on 'Add To Cart' button after filters added
I verify the message "The product has been added to your shopping cart" on top green Bar

arguments.val: The product has been added to your shopping cart

steps.name: I mouse hover on 'Shopping Cart' link
I mouse hover and click on 'Go to Cart' button button
I verify the message "Shopping cart"
I change the quantity to "2"
I click on 'Update shopping cart' button
I verify the total price "$2,950.00"
I click on checkbox 'I agree with the terms of service'
I click on 'Checkout' button
I verify the text as "Welcome, Please Sign In!"
I click on 'Checkout As Guest' button
I enter first name as "Karunaa"
I enter last name as "Koradiya"
I enter email as "karuna28koradiya@gmail.com"
I select country from country field as "India"
I enter city as "Ahmedabad"
I enter address as "16, Happy residency"
I enter postal code as "390002"
I enter number as "07436252668"
I click on 'Continue' button to shipping method
I click on Next Day Air Shipping Method
I click on 'Continue' for payment method
I click on 'Credit card' radio button
I click on 'Continue' button to payment information
I select credit card type "Master card"
I enter card holder name as "Miss Karunaa Koradiya"
I enter card number as "5425233430109903"
I select expiry month as "04"
I select expiry year as "2026"
I enter card code as "676"
I click on 'Continue' to confirm order
I verify payment method is "Credit Card"
I verify shipping method is "Shipping Method: Next Day Air"
I verify total price is "$2,950.00"
I click on 'Confirm' button
I verify text "Thank you"
I verify the message on confirm order page as "Your order has been successfully processed!"

arguments.val: Your order has been successfully processed!

steps.name: I click on 'Continue' to storage page
I verify the text pn login page "Welcome to our store"

name: Computers Page
description: As a user I want to check Computers Page functionality

steps.name: I am on home page
I mouse hover on 'Electronics' top menu tab
I mouse hover and click on 'Cell Phones' option in electronics tab
I verify the text on cell phones page as "Cell phones"
